item.title: Vanilla
item.description: Vanilla # Overview # id vanilla species Vanilla planifolia Jacks. ex Andrews family Orchidaceae plant part used fruit region of origin Tropical America macroarea Americas cultivation Madagascar; Indonesia; Mexico; Papua New Guinea; China color dark brown pod; creamy white extract link POWO Names # English Arabic Chinese Hungarian nan nan 香草 xiāngcǎo [fragrant-herb] nan
